-e ---

# kiln

𒆠𒊒 ki-ruⁿ kīru 𒄥𒄥 gur-gur /qurqurru/ гъукӏэ ğʷukʼe cook 𒌋𒀜 girⁿ kīru גִּיר gir կիր kir …

𒅎𒇌 oven ≈ vent wind

tin worker "smith" 𒌣 simugᵗ

𒈊 dinigʳ ≈ DINGIR 𒀭𒈾 ⲑⲣⲁⲛ tin 𒈊 dinigʳ 𐎚𐎐𐎐𐎗 tannūrᵍ tannour <> 𒁾𒉄 tabira 𒋼𒁉𒊒 te-bi-ru /tebīruⁿ/ Töpfer դարբին darbin smith 𒈊 dinigʳ ≈ 𒅎𒇌 duruna₂ 𒅎𒋾𒉡𒌨 ti-nu-ur #tinûru tannour ∋ tin

kiln furnace oven

𓏏 𓍔 𓄿 𓉐 | kiln | तन्दूर tandūr تندور tandūr تندور tandūr tender tandoor 𒈊 dinigʳ₃ 𒁲𒉌𒅅 ti-ni-ʒar •dinʒar तन्दूर tandūr تندور tandūr تندور tandūr tender tandoor 𒈊 dinigʳ₃ 𒁲𒉌𒅅 ti-ni-ig 𐎚𐎐𐎐𐎗 tnnr تَنُّور tannūrᵍ "furnace, oven" תַּנּוּר tannūr تنور tanur танӯр tanür < 𒈊 dinig₃ 𒁲𒉌𒅅 ti-ni-ig tahunga@Austronesian "kiln" ܐܲܬܘܼܢܵܐ āttuna ᏗᎦᏘᏗᎢ digatidii- 𒈊 dinig₃ 𒁲𒉌𒅅 di-ni-ig dinig kiln, furnace; air vent; smith, metalworker;

𒆠𒊒 ki-ru #kūru کوره kure քուրա kʿura քուրայ kʿuray горн gorn kohó horno caldera “kiln” ⇔ cairn ⇔ cook
𒆠𒊒 kiln, oven

𒆠𒉡𒉡 ki-nu-nu | brazier | kiln
𒆠𒉡𒉡 ki-nu-nu 𓂝 𓐍 𓊮
𒆠𒉡𒉡 ki-nu-nu πύραυνος pýravnon
𒆠𒉡𒉡 brazier ⇔ pýravnos √ fire

𓂝 𓐍 𓊮 мангал mangal > مِنْقَل minqal ++++ > μαγκάλι magkáli > Kelle 𓐍 Teller

𓏏 𓍔 | kiln | 𒌋𒌅𒉡 u-tu-nu ܐܲܬܘܼܢܵܐ āttuna تون tun @PERS < ϫⲁϩⲛⲓ “oven” techne
𓏏 𓍔 𓄿 𓉐 | kiln | therme ⇔ Tűz 𓍑 𓊮
𓏏 𓍔 𓄿 𓉐 | kiln | therme ⇔ charm Kamin ⲕⲁⲙⲓⲛⲟⲥ 🇬🇷 f. oven, furnace, kiln
𓏏 𓍔 𓄿 𓉐 | kiln | áith < भट्टा bhaṭṭā 𓉐 vs فَرْن farn:furnice fire

𓌨

kiln (for lime or bitumen)
→ Akkadian: 𒌋𒀜 (kīru)
→ Aramaic:
Hebrew: גִּירָא (gīrā),
Syriac: ܓܝܪܐ (gīrā)
→ Arabic: جير (jīr)
→ Persian: گرچ (gerač)
→ Ottoman Turkish: كیرچ (kireç), كیرج (kirec), كرچ (kireç), كرج (kirec)
Turkish: kireç
→ Bulgarian: кирѐч (kirèč)
→ Laz: ქერეჭი (kereč̣i)
→ Macedonian: креч (kreč)
→ Serbo-Croatian:
Cyrillic: кре̏ч
Latin: krȅč

→ Hebrew: גִּיר (gīr)  
→ Old Armenian: կիր (kir)  
    Armenian: կիր (kir)  
    → Chechen: кир (kir)  
    → Georgian: კირი (ḳiri)  
        → Bats: კირ (ḳir)  
        → Laz: კირი (ḳiri)  
        → Mingrelian: კირი (ḳiri)  
        → Ossetian:  
            Digor: къирӕ (k’iræ)  
            Iron: чъыр (ḱ’yr)  
    → Ingush: кир (kir)  
    → Zazaki: kirey  
→ Persian: کرس (kirs)

çirs'pe / çrwp “Krupp” ϭⲣⲱⲡ “oven” Schrupp Schuppen

𒊑𒁺𒊭𒆧𒃰𒋼 re-du ša kiš-kat-te
𒊑𒁺𒊭𒆧𒃰𒋼 remove from the kiln???

𒈊 dinig₃ kiln, smith nappašu;nappāhu 𒈾𒉺𒄷 na-pa-ḫu /nappāḫu/ 𒈾𒍣𒆪 na-si2-ku /nāsiku/ smith

𒈊 dinigᵒ ≈ 锻工 duàngōng "smith" < s'mitin' in 𒅎𒋾𒉡𒌨 ˢmi-ti-nu-ur #tinûru
